thread.title: MMA fighter brutally KO d while doing stupid dance - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: MMA fighter brutally KO d while doing stupid dance - Yahoo7

author: On February
title: MMA fighter brutally KO d while doing stupid dance - Yahoo7
text:
Share MMA fighter brutally KO d while doing stupid dance - Yahoo7 Joe Harding has learned the hard way that you should never dance or taunt your opponent during a round of MMA. Close VIDEO Fighter KO'd while dancing. 
During the British Challenge Mixed Martial Arts 18 event, Harding stupidly decided to taunt his opponent, Johan Segas, while the fight was still live. 
He got what he deserved as Segas unleashed a powerful and accurate head kick which Harding had no chance of stopping. 
The dancing fighter was immediately KO'd, but Segas finished the job with a few big punches on the ground before the referee could seperate the two. Close Cornerman saves the day after ref blunder UP NEXT VIDEO A cornerman has saved the day after an MMA ref missed a blatant submission. Source: Twitter/ Jolassanda Cornerman saves the day after ref blunder Close MMA fighter KOs opponent with vicious knees UP NEXT
